ygData.subject: Re: Centaur info on Crafted Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: its warrior only armor, all races can wear it but it started out as only medium at first which they changed after this last patch. Each piece has a different
ygData.messageBody:
its warrior only armor, all races can wear it but it started out as only medium
at first which they changed after this last patch. Each piece has a different
quest, example gauntlets one avocet charm and 2 star rubies. To get the whole
quest just run down to the village and hail whatever meadowgreen and he will
fill you in on the details. Also any race and class can do it. Check out eqlizer
for stats for each piece I believe they have them all.
